product_name: MSR Fuel Bottle with CRP Cap - 30 fl. oz.
long_description: With a 30 fl. oz. fill capacity, this aluminum bottle stores and transports your fuel and is compatible with all MSR liquid-fuel stoves. Connects to the threaded pump of your MSR stove for use as a fuel tank. Airtight seal allows fuel to be stored longer by preventing air from entering and degrading fuel. Child-resistant packaging (CRP) cap makes it difficult for kids to open the bottle. Made from single-piece, impact-extruded aluminum to prevent leaks and cracks. Bolstered shoulder and base resist bulging when pressurized. Bottles are manufactured in the United States and China; specific country of origin is noted on each bottle.
short_description: With a 30 fl. oz. fill capacity, this aluminum bottle stores and transports your fuel and is compatible with all MSR liquid-fuel stoves.
